actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that, for purposes of title 5, United States Code, cost of living adjustments allowed to officers and employees of the Postal Service shall be considered to be part of the basic pay of such officers and employees.

summary.text: Provides that, for purposes of the civil service retirement system, cost of living adjustments allowed to officers and employees of the Postal Service shall be considered to be part of the basic pay of such officers and employees.

titles.title: A bill to provide that, for purposes of title 5, United States Code, cost of living adjustments allowed to officers and employees of the Postal Service shall be considered to be part of the basic pay of such officers and employees.
